timeline.message:
[eclipse/xtext#1679]ported test code to java

Signed-off-by: Christian Dietrich <christian.dietrich@itemis.de>

timeline.bodyText:
In tests it would be safe to throw new RuntimeException or Assert.fail.
But it's only test code, so I'm fine with this.
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: Some unnecessary final locals in this class, but again not crucial.
timeline.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText: Local variable initialSize defined in an enclosing scope must be final or effectively final
replies.author: cdietrich
